Class ChatViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers.ChatViewController
public class ChatViewController extends ModelObserver
The controller for the Chat view Uses ModelObserver to be updated with the ViewModelState
